let customer = CreateCustomer::new()
    .name("Alexander Lyon")
    .email("test@async-stripe.com")
    .description("A fake customer that is used to illustrate the examples in async-stripe.")
    .metadata([(String::from("async-stripe"), String::from("true"))])
    .send(client)
    .await?;
